entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
